mapper.select: SELECT c.*,coa.companyName companyPayName,cob.companyName companySaleName,cu.name companyPayCustomerName,u.name companySaleUserName FROM t_contract c LEFT JOIN t_company coa ON c.companyPayId = coa.id LEFT JOIN t_company cob ON c.companySaleId = cob.id LEFT JOIN t_customer cu ON c.companyPayCustomerId = cu.id LEFT JOIN t_user u ON c.companySaleUserId = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id} AND c.state != 1;

SELECT c.id, c.contractNo FROM t_contract c WHERE c.applicationId = #{applicationId} AND c.state != 1
AND c.contractNo LIKE CONCAT('%',#{contractNo},'%')
SELECT * FROM t_contract c WHERE c.contractNo = #{contractNo}
